entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Rain showers or a few flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
